name: Olio Digital Labs
description:
Here at Olio we pride ourselves on being a Canadian small-market leader in the custom development of web and mobile applications. We are a dynamic and experienced team of planners, designers, and programmers who are passionate about modern web/mobile.  We love to find ways of improving processes or adding new capabilities for our clients through technology.
Tiny but mighty, our senior developers hold over 14 years of professional development experience working with Canada's largest (and smallest) operations.
